item.title: Sage Business Cloud Accounting
item.description: Update Stock2Shop hourly with Product data changes When changes are made to your Dolfin system, we can set an hourly time to check for Product updates. This can be set for which ever minute on the hour that best suits your workflow. Sage Business Cloud Accounting Company ID We can Sync data from specific Companies listed on your Sage Business Cloud Accounting. This allows you to have separate integrations for each Company on your system.
